attributes.action: Set aside a fixed amount of time for parliamentary debate relating to petitions with over 100,000 signatories.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to give more democratic force to the e-petitions concept, the government should set aside a fixed amount of time for parliamentary debate of e-petitions acquiring over 100,000 signatories

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
